objects.name: Analytic 0299
objects.description: Detection of spearphishing links through mail logs and browser activity. Behavior includes email with suspicious URLs → user click recorded in mail/web proxy logs → shell or interpreter launched from browser process.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: Application:Mail
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Inbound emails containing hyperlinks from suspicious sources

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve: Execution of scripts or binaries spawned from browser processes

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Flow
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Outbound requests to domains not previously resolved or associated with phishing campaigns

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: List of browser processes to monitor (e.g., firefox, chrome, chromium).
Custom regex patterns for detecting obfuscated or IDN homograph URLs.
